features.notes: Fully implemented with canva-ingestion.ts pipeline, canva-to-template.ts converter, and two-pass extraction (literal reconstruction + semantic templating). Includes CLI tool at scripts/ingest-canva-design.ts

features.name: AI Layout Extraction

features.notes: Fully implemented in src/ad-templates/extraction/ai-extractor.ts supporting GPT-4V and Claude Vision with confidence scoring

features.name: Two-Pass Extraction

features.name: Confidence Scoring

features.notes: Fully implemented in src/ad-templates/extraction/confidence-scorer.ts with per-layer confidence scores, auto-approve/manual-review thresholds, and comprehensive confidence reporting. Integrated with two-pass extraction system.

features.name: Human-in-the-Loop Editor

features.notes: Implemented in src/ad-templates/compositions/AdTemplateStill.tsx with dynamic canvas support

features.notes: Implemented in AdTemplateStill.tsx with AdTemplateStillSchema for Remotion Studio visual editing

features.name: Golden Render Recreation Test

features.notes: Implemented in src/ad-templates/testing/golden-test.ts with pixel diff comparison and threshold evaluation

features.name: Layer Geometry Tests

features.notes: Implemented in golden-test.ts with testLayerGeometry() function and tolerance-based validation

features.name: Text Overflow Tests

features.notes: Implemented with overflow detection in text-fitting.ts detectOverflow() function

features.name: Deterministic Rendering Tests
features.description: Render same props twice, verify identical output hash

features.notes: Implemented in canva-client.ts with CanvaClient class supporting design reading, export jobs, and file downloads. Includes type definitions in canva-types.ts for all Canva element types

features.name: Canva Export Jobs
features.description: Export design to PNG/JPG/PDF via Canva Connect for golden references
features.notes: Fully implemented in canva-client.ts with createExportJob(), getExportJob(), waitForExportJob(), exportDesign(), and downloadExport() methods. Supports PNG/JPG/PDF/MP4/GIF formats with quality options

features.name: Template Storage
features.description: Store template.dsl.json, reference.png, source.canva.designId, extraction metadata
features.notes: Implemented in template-storage.ts with TemplateStorage class. Manages template.dsl.json, metadata.json, and reference.png in data/templates/ directory. Supports CRUD operations, search by criteria, and timestamp tracking

features.name: Google Veo 3.1 Provider
features.description: Integration with Google Veo 3.1 API for AI video generation from images/prompts
features.notes: Implemented in src/api/veo-client.ts with VeoClient class. Supports image-to-video, 8/16s durations, 9:16/16:9/1:1 aspect ratios. Job handler wired in server.ts

features.name: Veo Image-to-Video Generation
features.description: Generate video clips from static images using Veo 3.1
features.notes: VeoClient.generateVideo() in src/api/veo-client.ts. Accepts imageUrl/imageBase64, prompt, duration, aspectRatio. Job handler 'veo-generate' in server.ts

features.name: Veo Job Status Polling
features.description: Poll Veo API for job completion status and retrieve output
features.notes: VeoClient.getJobStatus() and waitForCompletion() with configurable pollInterval/maxWaitTime. GET /api/ai/veo/jobs/:jobId endpoint in server.ts

features.name: Nano Banana (Gemini) Image Provider
features.description: Integration with Google Gemini/Nano Banana for rapid image generation
features.notes: Implemented in src/pipeline/nano-banana-stage.ts using gemini-2.5-flash-image. runNanoBananaStage() generates before/after image pairs with product analysis

features.name: Before/After Image Pair Generation
features.description: Generate matching before/after image pairs with consistent subject identity
features.notes: Uses 'before' image as reference for 'after' generation to maintain visual consistency. Supports product image reference and text-only mode

features.name: Before Image Prompt Template
features.description: Prompt template for 'before' scenes emphasizing problem state
features.notes: buildBeforePrompt() in nano-banana-stage.ts. Emphasizes problem state, frustration, pain point. Character style parameterized

features.name: After Image Prompt Template
features.description: Prompt template for 'after' scenes showing improved state
features.notes: buildAfterPrompt() in nano-banana-stage.ts. Emphasizes solution state, satisfaction, visual consistency with before scene

features.name: Before/After Reveal Composition
features.description: Remotion composition for before/after reveal videos with transitions
features.notes: Implemented in src/compositions/BeforeAfterReveal.tsx. 8s video with whip-pan, registered as BeforeAfterReveal, BeforeAfterReveal-Square, BeforeAfterReveal-Landscape in Root.tsx

features.name: Whip-Pan Transition Effect
features.description: Fast horizontal pan transition between before and after states
features.notes: WhipPanOverlay component with motion blur streaks and flash effect. 15-frame (0.5s) transition with cubic easing

features.name: Handheld Camera Simulation
features.description: Subtle camera shake for authentic phone footage aesthetic
features.notes: getCameraShake() in BeforeAfterReveal.tsx. Multi-frequency sine waves for organic shake, intensified during transition. Configurable via enableCameraShake and cameraShakeIntensity props

features.name: REST API Gateway for External Consumers
features.description: HTTP API endpoints for Content Factory, PCT, MediaPoster integration
features.notes: 6 new endpoints added to server.ts: /api/render/video, /api/render/static, /api/ai/veo, /api/ai/veo/jobs/:jobId, /api/ai/nano-banana, /api/templates/before-after. Listed in /api/v1/capabilities

features.name: POST /api/render/video Endpoint
features.description: Video rendering endpoint accepting brief JSON
features.notes: POST /api/render/video in server.ts. Accepts brief, quality, outputFormat, webhookUrl. Returns jobId, status, outputUrl, pollUrl

features.name: POST /api/render/static Endpoint
features.description: Static ad rendering endpoint with multi-size output
features.notes: POST /api/render/static in server.ts. Supports multi-size output (enqueues one job per size). Accepts template, bindings, sizes[], format, webhookUrl

features.name: POST /api/ai/veo Endpoint
features.notes: POST /api/ai/veo in server.ts. Accepts imageUrl/imageBase64, prompt, duration, aspectRatio, seed. Returns jobId with pollUrl

features.name: POST /api/ai/nano-banana Endpoint
features.notes: POST /api/ai/nano-banana in server.ts. Accepts product, beforePrompt, afterPrompt, characterStyle, imageCount. Wired to nano-banana-generate job handler

features.name: POST /api/templates/before-after Endpoint
features.notes: POST /api/templates/before-after in server.ts. Renders BeforeAfterReveal composition with whip-pan transition. Accepts before/after images or videos, brand config, transition options

features.name: Replace MockVideoProvider with Real Veo/Runway Provider
features.description: Remove MockVideoProvider from python/services/video_providers/__init__.py fallback chain. Wire up real Veo 3.1 or Runway ML API as the production video provider. Raise NotConfiguredError when no provider is configured instead of falling back to mock
features.notes: MockVideoProvider removed from __init__.py. NotConfiguredError added to base.py. mock_provider.py moved to tests/video_providers/. All ProviderName values handled with NotConfiguredError for unimplemented providers
acceptance: mock_provider.py deleted or moved to tests/
Real video provider (Veo/Runway) makes actual API calls
NotConfiguredError raised when no provider API key configured
grep -r 'MockVideoProvider' python/services/ returns zero results outside tests/

features.name: Video Provider Integration Tests with Real API
features.description: Add integration tests that verify the real video provider works end-to-end with actual API calls (can use test/sandbox API keys)
acceptance: Integration test creates a real video clip via API
Test verifies output URL is accessible
Tests skip gracefully when API key not available
